text: Sergei Vladislavovich Smelov (; born 20 May 1969 in Moscow) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo Moscow reserves players Category:FC Dinamo Sukhumi players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk players Category:FC Khimki players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Sergei Smelov
